description: Explore how Elon Musk is redefining innovation through open-source collaboration. From Tesla's open patents to OpenAI's ethical AI, discover Musk's commitment to community-driven technological advancement across various industries.
keywords: Elon Musk, open source, innovation, collaboration, Tesla, SpaceX, Neuralink, The Boring Company, OpenAI, technology, patents, AI, community, transparency, sustainability
title: Elon Musk and Open Source: Redefining Innovation Through Collaboration
